title: Programming
description: I learned how to program shortly before we met and he was already an accomplished programmer. We got to know each other more when we worked together on a hackathon project. I often asked him for help on my programming projects.

title: Communication
description: We were both living in San Francisco when we got together. I moved to Los Angeles for college in September 2015. We were on and off until July 2016.

title: Fun
description: We often planned dates, discussed restaurants, and the recreational activities we had happen that day.

title: Relationship
description: We cared for each other and tried our best to make time for each other.

title: Work
description: We often talked about his job. The model identified his day-to-day responsibilities and how my ex would talk about them. Publishing these topics would make him identifiable, so I've chosen not to include them.

title: Internships
description: Every summer before and during college I worked a software engineering internship. I discussed the process of navigating and landing these internships with him. He was supportive every step of the way.

title: Stress
description: I struggled with health issues through high school and college. We often vented to each other.

title: Marginalized identity
description: During this time, I was active in space focused on social justice & advocacy. We often disagreed on the validity of these sentiments. I often vented about how I struggled with being a woman of color in tech and attending a predominantly white institution.

title: Self
description: We were teenagers. We would discuss the way we saw ourselves and the development of our identities.

title: The outside world
description: We sought and contemplated our relationships to friends, family, and colleagues. We were young and our lives were ahead of us.
